weatherForecast.highlights: Dálítill slydda og snjór til fjalla í hægum vindi á laugardag og sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is little snow in the mountains.

snowpackStructure.highlights: There is little snow in the mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Windslabs are developing in the north and the east since there has been snowing quite alot in strong N-NE winds
travelAdvisory.highlights: Windslabs are developing in the north and the east since there has been snowing quite alot in strong N-NE winds

avalancheActivity.highlights: A considerable amount of snow fell in the mountains in NNE-NE winds at the beginning of the week. Wind slabs have formed.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It generally snowed more in the valleys than on the coast at the beginning of the week. The snow is rather light and has formed snowdrifts  and wind slabs.

travelAdvisory.comment: Windslabs are developing in the north and the east since there has been snowing quite alot in strong N-NE winds
travelAdvisory.highlights: Windslabs are developing in the north and the east since there has been snowing quite alot in strong N-NE winds

avalancheActivity.highlights: Isolated wind slabs formed at the beginning of the week due to considerable snow fall in the mountains in strong NNE-winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Overall, there does not appear to be much snow in the mountains despite precipitation measuring 30-60 mm in settlements at the beginning of the week. The snow fell in NNE-winds, scouring ridges and windward slopes. Isolated wind slabs developed in gullies and sheltered depressions.

travelAdvisory.comment: Windslabs are developing in the north and the east since there has been snowing quite alot in strong N-NE winds
travelAdvisory.highlights: Windslabs are developing in the north and the east since there has been snowing quite alot in strong N-NE winds
